name: metrics_resolf
description: Metrics snapshot for the resolf tile

kind_id.description: The kind_id of this tile instance within its type (e.g., 0, 1, 2 for multiple tiles of same type)

sample_id.description: Unique identifier correlating samples taken at the same time across tiles

LeaderStarted.description: Sampled because this validator started leading a slot

LeaderEnded.description: Sampled because this validator finished leading a slot

sample_slot.description: The slot number for which this sample was taken, if applicable

tile.description: Common tile metrics shared by all tiles

pid.description: The process ID of the tile

tid.description: The thread ID of the tile. Always the same as the Pid in production, but might be different in development

context_switch_involuntary_count.description: The number of involuntary context switches

context_switch_voluntary_count.description: The number of voluntary context switches

page_fault_major_count.description: The number of major page faults

page_fault_minor_count.description: The number of minor page faults

status.description: The current status of the tile. 0 is booting, 1 is running. 2 is shutdown

heartbeat.description: The last UNIX timestamp in nanoseconds that the tile heartbeated

in_backpressure.description: Whether the tile is currently backpressured or not, either 1 or 0

backpressure_count.description: Number of times the tile has had to wait for one of more consumers to catch up to resume publishing

regime_duration_nanos.description: Mutually exclusive and exhaustive duration of time the tile spent in each of the regimes

cpu_duration_nanos.description: CPU time spent in each CPU regime

cpu_duration_nanos_wait.description: Wait (task was runnable but not scheduled)

cpu_duration_nanos_user.description: User (task was scheduled and executing in user mode)

cpu_duration_nanos_system.description: System (task was scheduled and executing in kernel mode)

no_bank_drop.description: Count of transactions dropped because the bank was not available

stash_operation.description: Count of operations that happened on the transaction stash

stash_operation_inserted.description: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was added to the stash

stash_operation_overrun.description: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was dropped because the stash was full

stash_operation_published.description: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was published as the blockhash became known

stash_operation_removed.description: A transaction with an unknown blockhash was removed from the stash without publishing, due to a bad LUT resolved failure, or no bank. These errors are double counted with the respective metrics for those categories

lut_resolved.description: Count of address lookup tables resolved

lut_resolved_invalid_lookup_index.description: The transaction referenced an index in a LUT that didn't exist

lut_resolved_account_uninitialized.description: The account referenced as a LUT hasn't been initialized

lut_resolved_invalid_account_data.description: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be parsed

lut_resolved_invalid_account_owner.description: The account referenced as a LUT wasn't owned by the ALUT program ID

lut_resolved_account_not_found.description: The account referenced as a LUT couldn't be found

blockhash_expired.description: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because the blockhash was expired

transaction_bundle_peer_failure.description: Count of transactions that failed to resolve because a peer transaction in the bundle failed
